actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) carbazole; (2) r salt; (3) chloranil; (4) 2,4, 5-trichloroaniline; (5) 2,5-dichloroaniline; (6) 2,4-dinitro aniline; (7) na salt; (8) 4,4-benzidine 2,2-disulfonic acid; (9) c-amine; (10) ethyl honolog; (11) ortho naphthionic acid 1-amino-2-naphthalene sulfonic acid; (12) meta nitro para toluidine; (13) naphthal asbs; (14) a-I coupler; and (15) vat red 1 dye.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals.
